synopsis.text: Los Angeles returnee, Minami Kurihashi, steps into the prestigious Gokurakuin Joshi High School, or 'Gokujyo', with a plan to conquer the school with her striking beauty. However, her aspirations for dominance quickly crumble in the face of her eccentric classmates' outrageous antics. Among them is the audacious Akabane Aya, who is constantly vying for supremacy in everything, especially sex appeal, often resulting in humorous blunders. Set in an all-girls school, this anime is a comedic rollercoaster ride filled with yuri fanservice innuendos and the action-packed, event-filled high school life of these unconventional girls. From public bra displays to underwater filming attempts, expect the unexpected in this hilarious misadventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
